name: Order Domain
description: Clerics of the Order Domain enforce law and structure through divine authority, commanding allies to strike and compelling foes to obey.

1.name: Order Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Voice of Authority
1.description: When you cast a spell on an ally, you can command it to make an attack as a reaction.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Order’s Demand
2.description: You present your holy symbol and compel nearby creatures to drop what they are holding and be charmed briefly.

6.name: Embodiment of the Law
6.description: You can cast certain enchantment spells more swiftly for a limited time, improving your action economy.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit with a weapon attack, you deal extra psychic damage.

17.name: Order’s Wrath
17.description: When you deal your Divine Strike damage, you can mark the target so allies deal extra damage to it.
